sentence: If Herschel Walker wins Georgias U.S. Senate seat, he would become the most prominent elected official in the nation who has struggled openly with a mental illness.
author: Shannon McCaffrey
title: Herschel Walkers mental health battle raises questions about treatment

sentence: Kimberly: So Herschel Walker is running on the Republican ticket for Senate in Georgia.
title: 10 Republican Voters in Swing States on Trumps Hold on the Party
